snippet: Discounts on furniture, bedding, tableware, pillows and rugs.
lead_paragraph: Bedding, pillows and table linens from John Robshaw are as much as 75 percent off, through May 4 (the Indigo Dip decorative pillow, regularly $100, is $40); 245 West 29th Street (Seventh Avenue), (212) 594-6006. Hand-embroidered and -printed pillows and hand-knotted and -embroidered rugs are up to 70 percent off at the Judy Ross Textiles sale, through May 4 (an 18-inch Fauna pillow, left, regularly $135, is $40); 22 East 17th Street (Broadway), Suite 931, (212) 842-1705, judyrosstextiles.com.

headline.main: Discounts on Bedding, Rugs and More
